body_html:
Testing now

On Thu, Feb 11, 2016 at 8:10 AM caisq notifications@github.com wrote:

@martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke @benoitsteiner
https://github.com/benoitsteiner @vrv https://github.com/vrv Further
information: I thought this might have to do with the special bazel flags
required in Mac. So I tested the following flag combinations for "bazel
test //tensorflow/python/..."

-c opt
--linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --genrule_strategy=standalone --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names

All of them failed in the same way, i.e., 46 of the 151 Python unit tests
failed.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#1033 (comment)
.

body:
Testing now

On Thu, Feb 11, 2016 at 8:10 AM caisq notifications@github.com wrote:

> @martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke @benoitsteiner
> https://github.com/benoitsteiner @vrv https://github.com/vrv Further
> information: I thought this might have to do with the special bazel flags
> required in Mac. So I tested the following flag combinations for "bazel
> test //tensorflow/python/..."
> 
> -c opt
> --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
> -c opt --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
> -c opt --genrule_strategy=standalone --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
> 
> All of them failed in the same way, i.e., 46 of the 151 Python unit tests
> failed.
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1033#issuecomment-182937374
